Description: Items sold include what is described and pictured, which from time to time may not include all the accessories included with the items original new purchase package. Our items are used and arrive in our hands with limited accessories. Due to the recent eBay policy change, we will no longer be able to accept returns You are bidding on a 1980s Yamaha SBG2000 Neck Thru Sunburst Guitar Made in Japan w/OHSC. This guitar is used but in good condition. My manager said the reason it looks like it does is something he has heard called "Ghosting". It's almost like the guitar got cold and the polyurethane stayed in place but then the clear coat lifted. Please see the photos for more information. Feel free to email me with any questions you may have. All items included in the auction are depicted in the photographs provided. If you are the winning bidder please include your telephone number on your PayPal Payment so we can contact you directly with any questions regarding shipping. Shipment to Alaska and Hawaii may cost more than posted shipping amount. Residents in these states will be required to pay difference in shipping costs. If you are a resident of one of these areas please let us know BEFORE making your payment so we can adjust shipping rate. We do not under any circumstances ship internationally.
